      • calculateProduction

        public static java.util.Map<Player,java.util.EnumMap<ResourceType,ProductionResult>> calculateProduction(WorldMap map,
                                                                                                         java.util.List<Player> playerList,
                                                                                                         int round)
        Calculate production for the given players on the given map on the given round number.
        Parameters:
        map - map to calculate production on
        playerList - list of players to calculate production for
        round - round number (affects food requirement)
        Returns:
        map from players to production results for each resource

      • bound

        protected static int bound(int quantity,
                           int min,
                           int max)
        Bound the given quantity by the given min and max. If quantity is less than min, return min instead. If quantity is greater than max, return max instead. Otherwise, return quantity.
        Parameters:
        quantity - quantity to bound
        min - lower bound
        max - upper bound
        Returns:
        quantity bounded by min and max
